name: Gay Sauna: The Board Game
description:
Gay Sauna the Board Game is a fun fast paced tabletop roleplaying game where you play the role of a horny visitor playing a hookup contest against your fellow players.

Players adventure through the sauna visiting exciting cruising areas including the Dry Sauna, Steam Room, Cabins and the mysterious Dark Room.

Armed with a handful of tactical Action Cards to give you the edge over the competition or drop them to their knees, players need to find their matches and pounce to catch the boys before closing time while enduring an onslaught of hilarious and disgusting random events.

—description from the designer
